message.body: Thanks for the photo. Did you guys carve your pumpkin yet?
I was just about to text you. I emailed you and Sam the rest of the pictures. But the videos are too large to send. I think we're carving it this weekend. We still need to sketch a design. Did you?
Wow. I do not have the skill or the patience to do something like that. But you do with all those tiny nail designs. Haha. Good luck with that! I look forward to seeing it :)
Why thank you very much. And I can't wait to see yours!

Oy. So I've just come to the decision that I'm going to stop working next semester and bang out all of my classes so that I can (hopefully) start jefferson in the fall! I have to take 5 courses...2 in the spring and 3 in the summer. The thing that sucks: I have to take a classes at nova and ccp during the summer!
Well that makes sense. But that does suck having the courses split like that in the summer. When do you apply to Jefferson?

Their applications just opened like a week ago. The closing date is May 1st but they have a rolling admission so I'll probably submit it sometime between what's left over this month beginning of next month.
Ugh! The idea of being broke again is upsetting....
I know. But you've been working. You should have some savings to get by. It will be worth it in the long run.
